recommended_degree: Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Komputer, Sistem Komputer, Teknologi Informasi, Sistem Informasi (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Assist in deploying, monitoring, and maintaining applications and services on Google Cloud Platform.
- Support the setup and configuration of GCP services such as Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL, BigQuery, and Kubernetes Engine.
- Help in developing scripts or automation tools to streamline cloud operations.
- Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues in cloud environments.
- Assist in managing cloud security, IAM roles, and permissions.
- Support data migration, backup, and recovery tasks within GCP.
- Participate in documenting cloud architecture, processes, and operational procedures.
- Collaborate with the development and operations teams on cloud-based projects.
